name: Otton - Beta
description:
In 2008, myself and 2 friends decided to make an adventure game. It take place in France during the Middle Age. You are "Otton". A french monk looks for terrible (and funny)  investigation in this Point & Click Adventure in Brugundy.. You are a detective french monk <3

Gamedesign & Gameplay= Vincent GUERIN

2D animation Artist & Sprites Artist = Salomé LAGRESLE

Background & 2D Artist = Brice REBILLARD
